items.title: A checkup on weight-loss drugs
items.author: Reuters
items.content:
What started as a story about Hollywood waistlines has become a global phenomenon. Weight loss drugs are becoming more and more mainstream a few years after making their dramatic debut. On this weekend episode of Reuters World News, our health reporters weigh in on the impact of these game-changing drugs, and where they go from here.Â 






Sign up for the Reuters Econ World newsletter here (https://www.reuters.com/newsletters/reuters-econ-world/) .

items.title: US House approves bill to avert government shutdown | REUTERS
items.author: Reuters
items.content:
The Republican-controlled House passed legislation that would avert a government shutdown, defying President-elect Donald Trump's debt ceiling demand. The Senate must now pass it before midnight on Friday, when the current funding expires. 
#News #Reuters #Newsfeed #usa #politics

items.title: Novo Nordisk plunges after obesity drug trial disappoints | REUTERS
items.author: Reuters
items.content:
Novo Nordisk said its experimental next-generation obesity drug CagriSema helped patients cut their weight by 22.7% in a late-stage trial, below the 25% it had expected, wiping as much as $125 billion off its market value.
